pages.text: $(mob)牛$()是一种在$(thing)主世界$()随处可见的动物。它被攻击时会逃跑，可以使用$(item)小麦$()进行繁殖。$(p)它是食物和其他材料的重要来源，详情见下一页。
$(mob)牛$()在死亡时会掉落$(item)生牛肉$()， They also drop $(item)Leather$(), which can be made into armor or various other items such as $(item)Books$().
Using an empty $(item)Bucket$() on a $(mob)Cow$() fills it with $(item)Milk$(). It can then be drinked to clear all potion effects on the user.
